author: spencer_tb
content:
ðŸ§ª Fusaka Devnet-5 EEST release v1.0.0: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/fusaka-devnet-5@v1.0.0

- Adds tests to cover the EIP-7918/BPO bug on `fusaka-devnet-4`.
- Additional tests for EIP-7883/7823.
- Tests are now filled from Prague, so all EEST test cases are filled/refilled for both Prague/Osaka.

**Some comments**:
- We define BPOs as there own hard forks within the test fixtures for the new EIP-7918/BPO cases. For example `BPO1`, `OsakaToBPO1AtTime15k`, `BPO2`,  `BPO1ToBPO2AtTime15k`, etc. These are blockchain tests. If running these locally (not hive) you will need to define these forks for the test runner.
  - Additionally the `blobSchedule` must be loaded from the config defined in the fixture `config`. These differ from those used on the devnet to tests different scenarios.


<@412614104222531604> - we'll get this rolling on hiveview tmo!

Ping for any issues! Start a thread etc
